:: Najah ::

Najah smiling devily when he knew that the battle was near... =
and he crept, following at DevilDuer.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, October 15, =
2000 2:08 PM
  Subject: I have returned.


  Tiles are done, and I'm back!
=

  Happy birthday, Dcoburn!

  Airshadow, I think Hell Beast did notice you=
r probes.

  ::Zardus/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/DevilDuer/Havoc/Repressor::

 =
 Zardus dodges a shot, looking down at the battle to see Blender attacking =

  Feline. He growls, his jetpack powering down as he drops toward Blender,=
 
  slashing his sword at the bot's back as he lands.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~
  A shot hits Bloodystrike in the chest, sending him flying backwards=
 before 
  regaining stability.

  He aims carefully at Shockaract, firing =
off two missiles. He frowns as he 
  notices a femm laying in stasis lock o=
n the ground (Vamprah), gliding in and 
  landing near her.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~
  Reptilica opens his eyes, going out of stasis lock. He was dr=
enched with mech 
  fluid, but he was still somewhat functional.

  A stray=
 blast nearly hits him in the head, Reptilica realizing that he was in 
  a=
 battle. He gets up, running for the shuttle in which he had brought the Vo=
k.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  DevilDuer watches Najah eat a small mammal,=
 smiling as the bot asks where the 
  battle is.

  "Right this way, follow=
 me!" he says, taking off at a run toward the Alliance 
  base.
  ~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Havoc shakes slightly as shots hit his armor, regaining s=
tability as he 
  climbs up in the air after dropping a bomb.

  "Agreed," =
he replies to Demolition, then switching his comm-link to transmit 
  to al=
l the Warmachines, "Time show these bot that battle with us means death. 
 =
 Warmachines, UNITE!"

  With those words, Havoc transforms into a huge tor=
so, waiting for the other 
  Warmachines to transform into the other bodypa=
rts.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Hearing Havoc's command, Repressor transf=
orms into a leg, hatching onto 
  Havoc. He feels himself lose control as H=
avoc's mind takes over his circuits, 
  waiting for the others to combine.
=

        eGroups Sponsor
